description:
Emma Watson looked like she was ready to return to Hogwarts as she attended an exclusive charity dinner to celebrate the work of The Royal Marsden sponsored by fashion designer Ralph Lauren at Windsor Castle. 艾玛·沃特森受邀出席在温莎城堡举办的慈善晚宴，这次慈善晚宴由世界第一家癌症治疗研究综合中心“皇家马斯登”和时尚大亨Ralph Lauren 共同举办。

The actress was one of the many A-list stars invited to the bash which was hosted by Prince William on Tuesday night.艾玛是当天威廉王子邀请的贵宾之一。

Emma, 24, sported a somewhat preppy look as she teamed a crisp white shirt with a long grey skirt.24岁的艾玛，当天穿着带着一点学院风，上面穿着一件纯白色的衬衫，下面搭配了一条拖地灰色长裙。

The Harry Potter star looked chic in her ensemble as she kept accessories to a minimum as she held onto a small silver clutch and wore a plain silver necklace.艾玛的穿着整体看上去光彩照人十分青春，她身上配饰不多，只拿着一个银色手包，带着一条银色项链。

It’s safe to assume her preppy outfit was in homage to the evening’s sponsor, Ralgh Lauren, who’s fashion house is famous for that distinctive style.艾玛的着装很是讨巧，因为当天的举办者 Ralgh Lauren 就是擅长这样的搭配。

Prince William became president of the Royal Marsden Hospital in 2007 and threw the soirée because he is keen to enhance his philanthropic profile.威廉王子在2007年就掌管了皇家马斯登治疗中心，而举办晚宴的原因则是因为威廉王子希望能把他创立的这项事业传播的更广。

Emma is currently about to begin work on her upcoming film, Regression, which is due for release in 2015.艾玛最近则是忙她即将在2015年上映的电影《Regression》。

title: 艾玛•沃特森学院风出席慈善晚宴

description:
沪江英乐：爱尔兰组合西城男孩 Westlife 成员 Kian Egan 个人新单《I'll Be》！队长深情无比，依然熟悉的爱尔兰气息，每一祯都是一幅美丽的画卷。西城男孩的气质延续，队长越来越有味道了，Kian Egan，快跟 Shane Filan 一起来华吧！

【Kian Egan 个人新单《I'll Be》】

歌词：

The strands in your eyes that color them wonderful
Stop me and steal my breath.
And emeralds from mountains thrust towards the sky
Never revealing their depth.
Tell me that we belong together,
Dress it up with the trappings of love.
I'll be captivated,
I'll hang from your lips,
Instead of the gallows of heartache that hang from above.

[Chorus:]
I'll be your crying shoulder,
I'll be love's suicide
I'll be better when I'm older,
I'll be the greatest fan of your life.

And rain falls angry on the tin roof
As we lie awake in my bed.
You're my survival, you're my living proof.
My love is alive and not dead.
Tell me that we belong together.
Dress it up with the trappings of love.
I'll be captivated,
I'll hang from your lips,
Instead of the gallows of heartache that hang from above

[Chorus]

And I've dropped out, I've burned up, I've fought my way back from the dead.
I've tuned in, turned on, remembered the things that you said

[Chorus:]
I'll be your crying shoulder,
I'll be love's suicide
I'll be better when I'm older,
I'll be the greatest fan of your...
I'll be your crying shoulder,
I'll be love's suicide
I'll be better when I'm older,
I'll be the greatest fan of your life.

The greatest fan of your life.
...greatest fan of your life.
